name: Drop and Explode: Soda Geyser
description:
What do you get when you mix a thousand mint candies with a cistern of soda? Let’s check! Carry out incredible experiments with coke in this fun explosion game. Create the highest soda geyser and reach the Moon!

The game rules are simple. Collect as many mint candies on your way, use multipliers to create even more balls, and drop everything into a bottle of coke. The more mint candies you gather, the higher your soda fountain is.

Why you’ll love this coke game:

- Fun experiments with coke & mint candies
- Challenges you’ve never dreamed of
- Exciting gameplay
- Hundreds of interesting levels
- Simple controls

Make your soda geyser erupt as high as possible! Download Drop and Explode right now and run fun experiments with coke!
